meanings.definition: A loyal and reliable supporter or member of a group.
meanings.sent1: The stalworths of the team always show up to help.
meanings.sent2: The community relies on stalworths like him during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The stalworths at the charity event made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent4: She was a stalworths, standing by her friend through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The stalworths in the organization were like pillars of strength.

meanings.sent1: The stalworths oak tree stood tall in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The old castle was made of stalworths stone that had weathered many storms.
meanings.sent3: The stalworths fence held up against the strong winds without a problem.
meanings.sent4: His stalworths arms carried the heavy load effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The stalworths bridge spanned the river, allowing safe passage for all.
